title: Batman - Bane of the Demon 01-04 (1998|Digital|wsz-Empire)
description:
Chuck Dixon, one of the greatest writers in the Dark Knight's illustrious history, writes this awesome tale of Bane meeting on of Dixon's favorite villains, Ra's Al Ghul. Graham Nolan provides the art. These are the "fixed" versions of the 4 individual issues, with crisp and clear digital copies by wsz-Empire. Thanks to them for their hard work; please seed, and enjoy! :-)
